headline: Billionaire Warren Buffett Just Added Pool Corp. to Berkshire Hathaway's Portfolio. 7 Things Investors Should Know Before Piling Into the Stock.
summary: Buffett and company have started buying a stock that's been swimming circles around the market for decades.
